description: Contact object representing interaction between objects in PFC. This interface is shared by all contact types: BallBallContact (ball-ball), BallFacetContact (ball-facet), BallPebbleContact (ball-pebble), PebblePebbleContact (pebble-pebble), and PebbleFacetContact (pebble-facet). Cannot be instantiated directly - obtain instances via itasca.contact.list() or itasca.contact.find().
instantiation: Cannot be instantiated. Obtained via itasca.contact.list() or itasca.contact.find()

methods.name: activate
methods.description: Set the contact activated state. If a contact has been activated it is always active.

methods.name: activated
methods.description: Get the contact activated state. If a contact has been activated it is always active.

methods.name: active
methods.description: Get the contact activity state.

returns.description: True if contact is currently active

methods.name: bonded
methods.description: Get the contact bonded flag.

methods.name: branch
methods.description: Get the contact branch vector in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: branch_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact branch vector in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: branch_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact branch vector in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: branch_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact branch vector in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: end1
methods.description: Get the object at the first end of this contact.

returns.description: Object at first end (typically a Ball)

methods.name: end2
methods.description: Get the object at the second end of this contact.

returns.description: Object at second end (typically a Ball)

methods.name: energies
methods.description: Get the energy partitions as a dictionary.

returns.description: Dictionary mapping energy names to values

methods.name: energy
methods.description: Get the current value of an energy partition.

methods.name: extra
methods.description: Get the contact extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: fid
methods.description: Get the contact fracture ID.

methods.name: force_global
methods.description: Get the contact force in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: force_global_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact force in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: force_global_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact force in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: force_global_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact force in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: force_local
methods.description: Get the contact force in the local coordinate system.

methods.name: force_local_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact force in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: X-component of force in local coordinates

methods.name: force_local_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact force in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Y-component of force in local coordinates

methods.name: force_local_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact force in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Z-component of force in local coordinates

methods.name: force_normal
methods.description: Get the contact signed magnitude of the normal force.

methods.name: force_shear
methods.description: Get the contact magnitude of the shear force.

methods.name: gap
methods.description: Get the contact gap.

methods.name: group
methods.signature: contact.group(slot: str or int = None) -> str
methods.description: Get the contact group name in a given slot.

methods.name: group_remove
methods.signature: contact.group_remove(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Remove from the given group from all group slots of the contact.

returns.description: True if group was removed from any slot

methods.name: groups
methods.description: Get a dictionary describing which groups this contact is part of. The keys are slot names and values are group names.

returns.description: Dictionary of slot to group name mappings

methods.name: has_prop
methods.description: Query the existence of a contact model property.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get the contact id.

methods.name: in_group
methods.signature: contact.in_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> bool
methods.description: Test if the contact is part of a given group. If slot is given, only that slot is searched. Otherwise, all group slots are searched.

returns.description: True if contact is in the group

methods.name: inherit
methods.description: Get the property inheritance.

methods.name: inhibit
methods.description: Get the contact inhibit flag.

methods.name: is_energy
methods.description: Query the existence of a contact model energy.

methods.name: method
methods.signature: contact.method(method_name: str, args: dict = None) -> None
methods.description: Execute a contact model method. The first argument must be a string identifying a method that exists in the contact model assigned to the contact. The optional second argument should be a dictionary with string keys which give the contact model method arguments.

methods.name: model
methods.description: Get the contact model name.

methods.name: moment1_global
methods.description: Get the contact moment acting on end1 in the global coordinate system.

returns.description: Moment vector on end1 in global coordinates

methods.name: moment1_global_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment1_global_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment1_global_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment1_local
methods.description: Get the contact moment acting on end1 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Moment vector on end1 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment1_local_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: X-component of moment on end1 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment1_local_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Y-component of moment on end1 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment1_local_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact moment acting on end1 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Z-component of moment on end1 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment2_global
methods.description: Get the contact moment acting on end2 in the global coordinate system.

returns.description: Moment vector on end2 in global coordinates

methods.name: moment2_global_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment2_global_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment2_global_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the global coordinate system.

methods.name: moment2_local
methods.description: Get the contact moment acting on end2 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Moment vector on end2 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment2_local_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: X-component of moment on end2 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment2_local_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Y-component of moment on end2 in local coordinates

methods.name: moment2_local_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact moment acting on end2 in the local coordinate system.

returns.description: Z-component of moment on end2 in local coordinates

methods.name: normal
methods.description: Get the contact unit normal.

methods.name: normal_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact unit normal.

methods.name: normal_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact unit normal.

methods.name: normal_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact unit normal.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: Get the contact offset.

methods.name: offset_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact offset.

methods.name: offset_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact offset.

methods.name: offset_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact offset.

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Get the contact persistence flag.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get the contact position.

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact position.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact position.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact position.

methods.name: prop
methods.signature: contact.prop(property_name or index: str or int) -> any
methods.description: Get a contact model property.

methods.name: prop_index
methods.description: Get a contact model property index.

methods.name: props
methods.description: Get the contact model properties as a dictionary.

methods.name: set_extra
methods.description: Set the contact extra data in the given slot.

methods.name: set_force
methods.description: Set the contact model force.

methods.name: set_group
methods.signature: contact.set_group(group_name: str or int, slot: str or int = None) -> None
methods.description: Set the contact group name in a given slot.

methods.name: set_inherit
methods.description: Set the property inheritance.

methods.name: set_inhibit
methods.description: Set the contact inhibit flag.

methods.name: set_model
methods.description: Set the contact model for this contact.

methods.name: set_persist
methods.description: Set the contact persistence flag.

methods.name: set_prop
methods.signature: contact.set_prop(property_name or index: str or int, value: any) -> None
methods.description: Set a contact model property.

methods.name: shear
methods.description: Get the contact shear direction.

methods.name: shear_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the contact shear direction.

methods.name: shear_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the contact shear direction.

methods.name: shear_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the contact shear direction.

methods.name: to_global
methods.description: Transform a vector from the local to the global coordinate system.

methods.name: to_local
methods.description: Transform a vector from the global to the local coordinate system.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Returns True if this contact is live.
